paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on genetic variants in the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.phenotype_details: LQT2 with action potential duration lengthening
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In a different work, Garg et al. generated LQT2 iPSC-CM from T983I-KCNH2 variant peripheral blood mononuclear cells.

functional_data.summary: Patch-clamp tests showed that action potential duration lengthening decreased the rapidly activating delayed rectifier K+ current (IKr).

variants.additional_notes: The variant was derived from peripheral blood mononuclear cells.
key_quotes: In a different work, Garg et al. generated LQT2 iPSC-CM from T983I-KCNH2 variant peripheral blood mononuclear cells.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear information on the KCNH2 variant.
